description: A remastered version of Dragon Ball Z that adheres more to the manga's story.  This version includes newly recorded dialog by the original voice actors, new sound effects, new OP/ED sequences, and a brand new HD video transfer.

title.romaji: Dragon Ball Kai: Mirai ni Heiwa wo! Goku no Tamashii yo Eien ni
title.native: ドラゴンボール改 未来に平和を！悟空の魂よ永遠に
title.english: Dragon Ball Z Kai: Peace for the Future! The Spirit of Goku is Forever
Saint Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac

title.romaji: Dragon Ball Z: Ryuuken Bakuhatsu!! Goku ga Yaraneba Dare ga Yaru
title.english: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
Dragon Ball Z Kai: The Final Chapters

name.native: Sofía María del Rocío Garza Ramírez
